content.rendered:
Guy realizes that he is actually a background character in an open-world video game. He decides to take control and become the protagonist of his own story – he will be the guy who adapts to this unbounded terrain and saves the world, but in his own way… until it’s too late.

Director: Shawn Levy

Writers: Matt Lieberman. Zak Penn

Stars: Ryan Reynolds. Jodie Comer. Taika Waititi
